entry.title: WIND WARNING , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 4.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming light early this morning then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
